Container.Name: ecowater2mqtt
Container.Overview: Fetches an ecowater watersoftener's state from ecowater portal and exposes it to an MQTT broker every minute. Supports autodiscovery via Home Assistant. Multiple docker containers will need to be installed to support more than one ecowater watersoftener. No WebUI is necessary or available.
